title: What Font: Please Help
content:
Can someone tell me what font this is by chance....?

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [unnamed.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822144723/http:/typophile.com/files/unnamed_0.jpg) | 49.67 KB |
author: renuance

comments.content:
"RazorBat": **[Avengeance Heroic Avenger](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822144723/http:/www.dafont.com/avengeance.font?text=RazorBat)** by M.G. Adkins [The Fontry, 2012, Free for personal use]  
"BASEBALL": **[Slant](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822144723/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Slant%20-%20Regular&fid=c5ecece8263f30a5e50bfb8192dfa6ec&fsize=60&text=BASEBALL&wrap=2)** from Dafont.com [unknown designer & license type (+a lot of other names)]
